strings.authorizeDescription: Requires authorization to continue using the mobile number to log in.
strings.subscript: The data shared with XXX is governed by the third-party privacy statement. You can cancel your authorization at any time in the privacy center of your Huawei ID.
strings.page-mobile-subscript: Enter the mobile number for verification and bind a Huawei account. An unregistered mobile number will be registered with a new XXX account.
strings.page-wifi-titileDes: WLAN networks that have been supported for your device.
strings.page-binding-subscript: Enter the mobile number for verification and bind a Huawei account. An unregistered mobile number will be registered with a new XXX account.
strings.page-binding-guideUseOtherNumber: You can also bind another mobile number.
strings.page-softap-desc-60: The connection is set up, and the device is being connected...
strings.page-help-guideTitle: Try the following operations and reconfigure the network:
strings.page-help-step1: 1.Determine if the device is powered on
strings.page-help-step2: 2.Confirm that the instructions have been followed
